articles.title: Qld region remains free from Covid-19 - Chinchilla News
articles.description: Coronavirus hot spots across the state revealed.
articles.content:
THE Central Highlands and Isaac regions remain 100 per cent free from coronavirus, while many surrounding districts continue to see new cases.
Eight cases of coronavirus have been recorded in Central Queensland, although they have all been restricted to coas… [+3095 chars]

articles.title: Dermatologist: ‘COVID toes’ a potential symptom of the new coronavirus - WECT
articles.description: A dermatologist is looking at a link between an inflammatory reaction of the toes and COVID-19.
articles.content:
EVANSTON, Ill. (Gray News) - A dermatologist is looking at a link between an inflammatory reaction of the toes and COVID-19.
Paller is calling for more testing on the condition so doctors can learn more about the link between the potential symptom and COVID-… [+548 chars]

articles.title: The Coronavirus May Be Doing Something Strange to Your Toes - Futurism
articles.description: "We don’t know for sure if it’s related to COVID-19."
articles.content:
Health practitioners are noticing a strange new sign that patients could be carrying the coronavirus without symptoms such as a dry cough or fever.
The media and even some health experts are now referring to the condition as COVID toes mysterious blue or red… [+1419 chars]
